etymons.meaning: to come to a halt, stop; to remain, stay

Preterit Intransitive.turoyo: ṣafroqayəm u=ʕmiro w-u=greʕo, w-azzehən l-u=šuqokalən b-i=dukṯod-mə́lla-lle l-u=sow-awoqayəmnafəqqm-u=tarʕobaroyo, kali qumiḥatta d-moḥe-li
translations: der Emir und der Diener auf,
‘He went out before the outer gate and stood in front of me so that he might strike me’; 40/10; 40/12

Preterit Intransitive.turoyo: aṯiaḥunux, lə=kali gabayna, w aṯiabre d-ʕammux, lə=kali gabayna 347; 33/76;
m-aṯməldə-qwərxul-li b-u=qawr-awo u=năfasayḏi kaliLB 110; u=kew-awo kali ftəḥleʕayne
translations: ‘The pain ceased, and he opened his eyes’ 75/114;

Infectum.turoyo: 1) hawaḥəṣto w bahozatṭr-owe b-hawxaaṯna, u=maṭro ema k-kole 355; 8/15;

mdabar-lanqašo d-qodər d-kolegabayna 355; 33/77; aġlabdəṯṯe k-kolənkmo=yawmebə-Ṣṭambul; w an=noše, d-kītbənne, k-nuḥtilə-Ṣṭambul 4/25; m-u=ṭaraf d-u=walikitoamroḥatta d-kolətharkehul d-oṯən i=amniye aw i=maḥkame d-obi amro ‘’; 24/302; adšatogu-kulenaharkeu=qamṣ-awo i=naqla d-ko=ḥozenoše, ko=koleʕal at=tarte raġloṯ-ayḏeaḥ=ḥaroye w-ko=maʕle at=tarte iḏoṯ-ayḏe
translations: ‘When the grasshopper sees men it stands up on the two hind legs and raises its two arms’; 38/6 [MT];

Infectum.turoyo: ono ko-kəlyal-lux m-i=naqla d-šamiʕonohul ema g-koleaʕlayxu 355; annaqqatamo b-i=rəḥyo ko-kolən l-u=dawro k-oṯeġălabenoše ko-ṭəḥni ko-kolən b-u=dawrohul d-oṯa-lle u=dawr-aṯṯe w-k-ṭəḥni w-gd-oṯən
translations: ‘I have been waiting for you since the moment I heard (about you)’ 75/78;
‘There at the mill people had to wait for their turn. A lot of people would come and mill (their grain). They would wait
their turn to come, then mill and go (home)’ 79/11;

Infectum.turoyo: ono zoyaʕ-way-no əšmo w-haw kibikoleno m-u=kewo d-ko-koyaw-li b-lalyo lo=ko-domaxno
translations: ‘I was a bit afraid (to tell you), but I can no longer endure the pain and I cannot sleep at night’ 78/166;

Infectum.turoyo: adlalyokulxumlayu ab=bawarəd-aṯxurəṣáṣ w-mqaweṣukulxu b-naqlaḥḏo lo=kolutuhul d-moḥutukulle d-aʕmayxu
translations: ‘Tonight you all fill your rifles with bullets and fire (them) together at the same time. And do not stop until you fired all (bullets)’ 83/82;

Infectum-wa.turoyo: 1) yawmo he, yawmo lo ŭṯe-wo papūrlăšan u=nqolo d-u=faḥmo, w kŭle-wo qəm d-u=šubbakayḏi369; 2/27; mqadamle, b-imomokŭle-wo, w-b-lalyomalax-wo 369; 29/303 [MT]; tamokət-yoṭayro; marfan-wo u=ḥa d-uṯe-wo u=ṭayr-awo d-kule-wo ʕalriše, huwehuwe-wo ḥakəm d-i=walay-ayo ‘; 24/310 [MT]
2) kul kas kŭle-wo ʕalḤannaHəndoke, yaʕni, ʕalḤannaGunáy 369; 11/203; u=zlām-anogud l-ówe-wamhaymno b-ruḥe, lə=kole-wa i=klayt-aṯe 370; 78/101;

Imperativ.turoyo: 1) klay d-ḥozeno, mə kt-owe 372; 47/69; 58/198; 65/50, 353; 75/100, 105; 77/116; zux hat bəṯr u=quṣro l-u=gabo d-kət-yoxalyo, zuxklay-li tamo 374; 115/151; lə=mərral-le, yaklay, ya l=əmmət w medelə=mərral-le LB 32; e omanno de klawuaʕliádyawma-ze lə=məfqūt-li EL 52;

Part act..turoyo: 1) aṯi u=zlām-awo d-kət-we kalyonawbačid-u=tarʕo 375; 58/175; ko-ḥayri, ko-ḥozənkītzlām b-i=qamaytaṯṯekalyo 375; 78/91; b-i=saʕay-aṯekitoməqabəlkmo=gammiyatkalye, bas məd-kət-ne raḥuqe w i=ʕišara d-kət-yoaʕlayye lo=k-maḥwiyo 4/37;

Infinitive.turoyo: 1) bale u=qărar-ayḏanmázlo-we, lat-we kloyo 11/47; gəd-əmmína-lox u=kloy-ayḏan d-arke m-mənmasale-yo

Preterit.turoyo: ḥəlle: ga i=masaleyaqúrto-yo, makleleiḏe 384; 75/192; b-i=gav-ayomaklelan u=qamyōn w yasəqinaʕalqarʕə-d-aq=qayse 386; 11/143; yăqīnkət-texabro me-ḥḏoḏe w nošelə=makəlyole LB 23; tamo ab=bakčiye an=nəṭuremaklalle u=huḏoyo ‘’; 24/300

Infectum.turoyo: aq=qaṣ-ani l-i=heviyayḏi, ḥaxoṯux d-oṯemakle-li? 400; 69/320; səmlilə=səmli haw qadənnomaklen-e EL 38;

Infectum-wa.turoyo: hŭwéno-wo maǧbūr b-iḏi d-makléno-wo feme 406; 11/266; d-lə=maklí-way-na u=ṭof-anodiḏan! 406; 63/308;
